## Overview

Gridwegen is a simplified, scalable implementation of the semi-parametric stochastic weather generator developed by Steinscheneider and Brown (2013).

## Installation

The development version of the package can be installed from github:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("Deltares/weathergenr")
```
